Natuzzi Italia

Eliot Wood Drive Dining Table

Crafted with premium materials and meticulous attention to detail, it provides exceptional support and durability while maintaining a sleek, stylish appearance. Its spacious design makes it ideal for both lounging and entertaining, while customizable finishes allow you to tailor it to your personal aesthetic.

From $5,200.00

Schematics:

Composition examples

Overview

Remember those amazing bedroom scenes from classic films? Whether it's Dustin Hoffman kneeling behind Ann Bancroft on what looks like her daughter's bed in The Graduate, or Audrey Hepburn sprawled out on the bed of her Manhattan flat with her orange cat perched on her back. These iconic scenes would fade from memory had they not been set in an exquisitely designed boudoir. Enter the Fenice bed by Natuzzi Italia, as at home on the set of a Franco Zeffirelli film as it is in your guest bedroom. This sleep system has the authenticity and timeless elegance it takes to make any interior a classic scene.

Technical Informations

- Queen size bed: 67"W x 92"D x 37"H

- King size bed: 83"W x 92"D x 37"H

Shipping

Your furniture will be delivered on time and in perfect condition just the way you ordered it. You'll get the same great service whether you choose full-service white glove delivery, our economical standard curbside service, or upgrade your standard service to Room-of-Choice. Our delivery services department will make sure your order is handled perfectly. Please note that online orders can only be shipped within the 48 continental United States.

Standard Shipping

Provides delivery to your door (apartment and multi-unit buildings are inside the main entrance) generally in 14 to 21 business days. Large items are shipped via a carrier truck service that provides the best service in your area. This option is the most cost effective, but please note that it does not include moving the piece into your residence or office and does not include any assembly. The customer is responsible for unpacking and completing any assembly that is necessary. Our delivery company will contact you within 10 to 12 business days to schedule an appointment to make your delivery. Delivery appointments are available Monday through Friday with hours depending on your area. Saturday deliveries require an additional charge; for a quote please contact us at support@italia-interiors.com

White Glove Service

Provides the full service with professional delivery, unpacking, and assembly in the intended room. Our delivery company will contact you within 14 to 20 days to schedule an appointment. Delivery appointments are available Monday through Friday with hours depending on your area. Saturday delivery requires an additional charge. Extra fee for white glove delivery will be charged at the shopping cart.

* We don't provide any service in some areas of USA. Please call us for more info.

Manufacturer

Cattelan Italia founded in 1979 by Giorgio and Silvia Cattelan, continues to surprise the furniture world by introducing innovative contemporary furniture for the past 35 years. Today, The management of Cattelan Italia was passed on to their son Paolo, who keeps the family tradition of working with some of Italy's most famous designers. Gastone Rinaldi, Yoshino and Emilio Nanni are but a few of the design innovators who've contributed to Cattelan's award-winning collection. At IDI as one of Cattelan dealer USA dealers, we very proud to showcase the largest selection of dining tables, chairs, sideboards, mirrors, in the Boston Metro Area to provide our loyal customers with some options of platform beds, coffee tables, chaise lounge and other contemporary furniture to complete their full interior design concept.
